Servers Configured and maintained transactional replication for flow of data from QA and Dev Server to the replica servers Monitored data activities like database status logs space utilization locks and long transactions Implemented SQL standards in writing stored procedures Triggers Views SQL functions Involved in resolving deadlock and blocking issues for concurrent users Worked with developers to optimize the code if required to minimize the duration and look if the indexes were used appropriately Provided appropriate access to users except system databases owners Refreshed databases for
